title: Life full of joy and laughter are better than being abundance of wealth with no friend
body: Life is about accepting changes and moving forward while acknowledging flaws

title: I want to go Snowboarding with fullstack buddies
body: Anyone interested to join me on a fun snowboarding adventure?

title: When will all of us become Millionaire ?
body: The Day will come when we realized money is not everything. Peaceful at mind are what define your wealth.
